Class Model

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model

  • public class Model
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the model of the program. It hold the logic for the program and is responsible for notifying the view.
    Author:
    mahmudaakter, rohansurana

      • isGameOver

        public javafx.util.Pair<java.lang.Boolean,Player> isGameOver()
        Check if the game is over. If game is over, pair.getLeft(boolean) == true and pair.getRight(Player) = Player.ONE or Player.TWO
        Returns:
        a Pair consisting information about Game.
